description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0lp2","text":"2023 NUS-Singapore iGEM team followed this protocol to characterise their New Composite Part \"GFP-sacB\" with IPTG and sucrose solution at various concentrations. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ekdog","text":"Inoculate cells with GFP-sacB gene from the cell stock.                      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gc3e","text":"Add   of LB media and   of the appropriate antibiotic to a Falcon tube. {"blocks":[{"key":"9u7po","text":"Incubate the Falcon tube at   in an incubator. {"blocks":[{"key":"3g45t","text":"Decide the concentrations of IPTG and sucrose solutions for characterization.                      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35f6o","text":"Add   of M9 media,   of the appropriate antibiotic, and   of cells cultured the previous day.                      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ohjd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75rle","text":"Add the required volume of IPTG to reach the desired concentration.                      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5cho","text":"Design an appropriate plate map, each sample (with a particular IPTG and sucrose concentration) must be repeated 3 times. Example of plate map:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8naq0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":274,"id":411458,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"1m21s\",\"text\":\"One of the actual plate map used by the NUS-Singapore iGEM 2023 team when characterizing the GFP-sacB gene.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nt4e86se.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nt4c86se.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nt4d86se.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nt4b86se.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8j4m3","text":"Adjust sucrose concentration by adding DI water and sucrose solution to each well (final volume of  ) according to the plate map. {"blocks":[{"key":"col6a","text":"Add   of cultured cells to each well already containing DI water and sucrose solution (final well volume of  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fgtsf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"220","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gv3v","text":" Place the 96-well plate into the plate reader.                      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g2fe","text":"After the reading is complete, remove the 96-well plate from the plate reader.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"52e8l","text":"Proper lab PPE must be worn at all times.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5291","text":"Since cells are used in this protocol, a Biosafety Cabinet (BSC) is required to ensure safety.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
